name: Luke Skywalker
description: Luke is known for his journey from an inexperienced youth to a skilled Jedi Knight. He discovers his true heritage as the son of Anakin Skywalker, who later becomes Darth Vader, and learns about the Force, a mystical energy field that grants him extraordinary abilities
